class.name: NavigationGeometryParser3D
class.brief_description: Parser to contribute a node's geometry data for [NavigationMesh] baking.
class.description: Parser to contribute a node's geometry data for [NavigationMesh] baking. If a script extends this class and the function [method _parses_node] is overridden and returns [code]true[/code], the overridden function [method _parse_geometry] gets called and can be used to add custom geometry data for the [NavigationMesh] baking process.

method.name: _parse_geometry
method.description: Called when overridden and the [NavigationMeshGenerator] is parsing geometry for [NavigationMesh] baking. Custom 3D geometry can be added to the [param source_geometry].

method.name: _parses_node
method.description: Called when parsing geometry nodes for [NavigationMesh] baking. If [code]true[/code] will call [method _parse_geometry] with this node.
